Package Model

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.Obstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, DungeonEntrance, Grass, Rock, Tree
    public abstract class Obstacle
extends GameObject
    Abstract class for Obstacles, which are impassable object on the map
    Author:
    Wes Rodgers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
